text: East 17 are an English boy band. They have sold 18 million records worldwide. Their first album Walthamstow went straight to number one in the UK. In 1994 they released the single "Stay Another Day". It was their only number one single. The band started in 1991 in Walthamstow, London with four members. ==Other websites== *Official website ==References== Category:1991 establishments in England Category:1990s British music groups Category:2000s British music groups Category:2010s British music groups Category:English boy bands Category:Musical groups established in 1991 Category:Musical groups from London
title: East 17
